thread.title: Soap | Fair City - entertainment.ie

author: Fiona Flynn
title: Soap | Fair City - entertainment.ie
text:
It's all going down in Carrigstown tonight as Sash is released from prison and Decco insists they should go for a drink in McCoy's, but Charlotte is ready for action and insists on The Station, where of course Nina's surprise party is going on. However, once they arrive Charlotte's conscience gets to her (who knew she had one) and insists they leave but looks like it already might be too late...
Meanwhile, Farrah and Wayne decide to keep their kiss to themselves, but a heart to heart between Orla and Wayne leads to him confessing... and fireworks ensue.
